attributes.action: NHS workers can get a suitable pay rise at least 2,5%.
attributes.additional_details: NHS workers have gone above and beyond during the pandemic.   This needs to be acknowledge.
attributes.background: Parliament to take 2% pay cut.  This money to be used to pay NHS workers a suitable pay rise at least 2.5%

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay, not Parliament or the UK Government. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:
http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
